name: part_006
file: tmp_大神ミオ５周年記念ライブ『ナイトループ』【 ホロライブ ⧸ 大神ミオ 】 [YqPVwYLcvrY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Solo performance of the song 'Fukaku Kon ni Naru' (Becoming Deep Navy) by Ookami Mio, set against a neon city backdrop.
Group performance of the song 'Waku Waku Everyday' (Exciting Everyday) by Ookami Mio, Nekomata Okayu, Inugami Korone, and Shirakami Fubuki on a brightly lit stage.

subtitles.original: ベイビーデイズにサヨナラ
subtitles.english: Goodbye to the baby days

subtitles.original: 見たくないもの照らすハイビームに
subtitles.english: In the high beams illuminating things I don't want to see

subtitles.original: 走る焦燥感
subtitles.english: Runs a sense of impatience

subtitles.original: 跳ね除けて前へ行けば
subtitles.english: If I push it aside and move forward

subtitles.original: 信号は皆 色を無くし消えた
subtitles.english: All the traffic lights lost their color and vanished

subtitles.original: 確かめたい
subtitles.english: I want to confirm

subtitles.original: この道が繋ぐ先を
subtitles.english: Where this road leads

subtitles.original: 深く深く紺になる
subtitles.english: It becomes a deep, deep navy

subtitles.original: 夜を往けるこの加速度
subtitles.english: This acceleration that lets me go through the night

subtitles.original: 光さえ超えてゆける程に
subtitles.english: To the point where I can even surpass light

subtitles.original: 強く強く踏み込んで
subtitles.english: Stepping on it strongly, strongly

subtitles.original: 僕は駆けるただ真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: I dash, just straight ahead

subtitles.original: 譲れない想いを抱いて
subtitles.english: Embracing feelings I won't give up

subtitles.original: 標識だらけの街を抜け出して
subtitles.english: Breaking out of the city full of signs

subtitles.original: 明日を探してた
subtitles.english: I was searching for tomorrow

subtitles.original: 常識も何も全部雑音と化してた
subtitles.english: Common sense and everything else had turned into noise

subtitles.original: 「何処まで行けるの？」なんて聞き飽きた台詞吐いて
subtitles.english: Spitting out lines I'm tired of hearing, like "How far can you go?"

subtitles.original: 曇った窓ガラスに書いた本音
subtitles.english: The true feelings I wrote on the fogged window

subtitles.original: すぐに指で消した
subtitles.english: I quickly erased with my finger

subtitles.original: 臆病でも
subtitles.english: Even if I'm a coward

subtitles.original: 揺るぎない軌跡
subtitles.english: An unwavering trajectory

subtitles.original: 確かな願いを
subtitles.english: With a certain wish

subtitles.original: 胸に遥か遠く
subtitles.english: In my heart, far away

subtitles.original: 錆び付くように軋んでも
subtitles.english: Even if it creaks as if rusting

subtitles.original: この真っ暗を灯し進む
subtitles.english: I move forward, lighting up this darkness

subtitles.original: たった一つ答えを追いかけて
subtitles.english: Chasing after the only one answer

subtitles.original: 脆くても良いこの腕で
subtitles.english: Even if they're fragile, with these arms

subtitles.original: 掴む為に手を伸ばすよ
subtitles.english: I'll reach out to grab it

subtitles.original: 打ち鳴らす鼓動の限り
subtitles.english: As long as my heart beats

subtitles.original: 何度この道で迷って
subtitles.english: How many times have I been lost on this road

subtitles.original: 見失ってどこへ行くの
subtitles.english: Lost my way, where am I going?

subtitles.original: 目指す場所もその意味も
subtitles.english: The place I'm aiming for and its meaning

subtitles.original: 一つしか無いのにな
subtitles.english: There is only one, though

subtitles.original: 曇った視界は
subtitles.english: My clouded vision

subtitles.original: 夜に溶けてもう一度
subtitles.english: Dissolves into the night once more

subtitles.original: ひらけてゆく
subtitles.english: And starts to clear up

subtitles.original: 視線の先
subtitles.english: At the end of my gaze

subtitles.original: 僕を連れてゆくよきっと
subtitles.english: It will surely take me there

subtitles.original: 深く深く紺になる
subtitles.english: It becomes a deep, deep navy

subtitles.original: 息を吸って今加速を
subtitles.english: Take a breath, and now, acceleration

subtitles.original: 傷付くほどに強くなると
subtitles.english: As I become stronger the more I get hurt

subtitles.original: 確かな色動き出す
subtitles.english: A certain color starts to move

subtitles.original: 纏ってゆけその身体で
subtitles.english: Wear it with that body

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな夜空の果てへ
subtitles.english: To the end of the vivid night sky

subtitles.original: 忘れないように
subtitles.english: So I don't forget

subtitles.original: 深く深く紺になれ
subtitles.english: Become a deep, deep navy

subtitles.original: 今を生きるこの加速度
subtitles.english: This acceleration that lives in the now

subtitles.original: 光だって超えてゆける場所へ
subtitles.english: To a place where I can even surpass light

subtitles.original: 強く強く踏み込んで
subtitles.english: Stepping on it strongly, strongly

subtitles.original: 僕を駆けるただ真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: I dash through, just straight ahead

subtitles.original: 譲れない想いを抱いて
subtitles.english: Embracing feelings I won't give up

subtitles.original: 止まらないで
subtitles.english: Don't stop

subtitles.original: 走り続ける意味を知るから
subtitles.english: Because I know the meaning of continuing to run

subtitles.original: わくわくエブリデイ
subtitles.english: Waku Waku Everyday

subtitles.original: 心地よい晴れ空
subtitles.english: A pleasant clear sky

subtitles.original: 今日は何をして遊ぼうか
subtitles.english: What should we do for fun today?

subtitles.original: いつまでも変わらない
subtitles.english: Never changing

subtitles.original: 雲を追いかけてみようか
subtitles.english: Shall we try chasing the clouds?

subtitles.original: はしゃぎ回って疲れて
subtitles.english: Frolicking around and getting tired

subtitles.original: お腹もすいて寝転んで
subtitles.english: Getting hungry and lying down

subtitles.original: 明日はもっといい日になりそう
subtitles.english: It looks like tomorrow will be an even better day

subtitles.original: 一緒だよ
subtitles.english: We're together

subtitles.original: いつもキラキラ毎日止まらないでしょ
subtitles.english: Every day is always sparkling, it won't stop, right?

subtitles.original: やりたいこと全部遊び尽くしても
subtitles.english: Even if we play through everything we want to do
